posts.postText:
After commotion with brohoster, we got in JUST in the nick of time, brought server down, made a backup, and kept it until we moved to a different host.

We are pleased to announce we have found a host that costs the same, offers us more RAM (less lag when many people are on), and we are now on an SSD-enabled server in Dallas, TX.
We will also be implementing some form of voice chat within the day. (more on that in the coming hours). We will also be implementing a small website.


   GOLDCRAFT IS ONLINE. ZERO LOSS, CONTINUE WHERE YOU LEFT OFF.   
Server ip is "ip.goldcraft.org" like always :)
